Toggle state

Details

Same set up as previous example with a dynamic grid depending upon the number of books in the array. I have now added a new _handleClick() method and assigned to the button to change the state of the React app. If there we less books in the hardcoded static array then the cards would appear larger and the parent grid classes would change.
